text: @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden Liar. Not all American people need tested. Would make a deal though...We’ll test everyone for COVID19, if every woman seeking a democrat approved abortion would be given an opportunity to see the baby she carries in an ultrasound before aborting her baby.
